preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This document describes known issues (and possible work-arounds). Each issue mentions the section of the reference documentation that explain the behaviour along with the associated JIRA entry which provides an estimate on when it will be solved. As a rule, Spring Dynamic Modules 1.0 RC1 aims to solve most, if not all of them.

section.title: 2.4 The Resource abstraction
section.para: The new osgibundle prefix is not yet in place - use bundle for the time being.

section.title: 2.6 Stopping the extender bundle
section.para: The shutdown algorithm considers all services exporter/imported by a bundle not just the ones managed by the application context.

section.title: 4.1.6 Service registration and unregistration lifecyle
section.para: Custom methods for the service registration listeners are not supported yet.

section.title: 4.2.1 Referencing an individual service
section.para: Conversion from service instance to ServiceReference is not supported yet.

section.title: 4.2.2 Referencing collections of services
section.para: Comparator-based sorting, applying natural ordering of services is not yet supported.
java.util.Comparable interface is not yet used for sorting.
